short_description: Evaluates writing quality, focusing on novelty, clarity, and prose style, outputting results in JSON format.
description: This pattern simulates an expert writer and editor analyzing content. It evaluates writing on three main criteria: novelty of ideas, clarity of argument, and quality of prose. The pattern provides ratings and explanations for each aspect, offers improvement recommendations, and gives an overall rating based on the lowest individual score. The analysis is output in a structured JSON format for easy parsing and integration.
